channel.title: Changing the initial
channel.description: on my server, i want to change the starting positions. So i go into player.java, search for //initial x and y and it comes up and theres 2 lines, one thats x (top) and one thats y (below). I change the x and y's to what i want them to be, and i compile and run and on my server when i make a new account and loggin im still in varrock bank... can someone please tell me the reason why it wont change the starting coordinates? Thanks. And yes, i have searched the forums, and yes, i did even search google...[br][size=1]Posted on: May 28, 2007, 04:49:54 PM[/size][hr]cmon... i really need help!

item.title: Changing the initial
item.dc:creator: @the_noob the noob
item.description:
@the_noob wrote:

on my server, i want to change the starting positions. So i go into player.java, search for //initial x and y and it comes up and theres 2 lines, one thats x (top) and one thats y (below). I change the x and y’s to what i want them to be, and i compile and run and on my server when i make a new account and loggin im still in varrock bank… can someone please tell me the reason why it wont change the starting coordinates? Thanks. And yes, i have searched the forums, and yes, i did even search google…[br][size=1]Posted on: May 28, 2007, 04:49:54 PM[/size][hr]cmon… i really need help!
